DEFECT.DESCRIPTION:
Potential read overflow of null terminated buffer using expression 'rgpTest[idx]' PREFAST_NEWLINE This is likely to be due to incorrect or insufficient validation of the buffer access PREFAST_NEWLINE Buffer rgpTest is a global variable PREFAST_NEWLINE Buffer is of length nullpos(rgpTest)`7 + 1 elements (4 bytes/element) [length of zero terminated string] PREFAST_NEWLINE Accessing the element (4 bytes/element) at element offset 1 PREFAST_NEWLINE
PREFAST_NEWLINE Values of variables: PREFAST_NEWLINE idx = 1 PREFAST_NEWLINE
PREFAST_NEWLINE where PREFAST_NEWLINE {loop iterations}'10 == 0 PREFAST_NEWLINE nullpos(rgpTest)`7 <= 2 PREFAST_NEWLINE nullpos(rgpTest)`7 >= 0 PREFAST_NEWLINE
PREFAST_NEWLINE Overrun access occurs when PREFAST_NEWLINE nullpos(rgpTest)`7 == 0 PREFAST_NEWLINE
